title: Spinach, pea and red onion salad
ingredients: ['75g (3 oz) fresh spinach leaves, washed and drained', '1/4 medium sized red onion, finely sliced', '120g frozen peas or broad beans', 'Juice of 1/2 lemon', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh mint', '1 1/2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', 'Salt and pepper to taste']
